title: The Relentless Rise of Matteo Jorgenson Continues at Tour de France: ‘I Keep Surprising Myself and Getting Better Every Race’
content:
Jorgenson estimates best power of his career on Plateau de Beille riding on feel and lifts lid on Visma-Lease a Bike’s plan for Alps: ‘We’re not here to finish second’.

Read the full article at The Relentless Rise of Matteo Jorgenson Continues at Tour de France: ‘I Keep Surprising Myself and Getting Better Every Race’ on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
